text.p: Results and closing scores on the third day of rain-affected four-day English county championship matches on Saturday:
At Swansea: Glamorgan beat Sussex by 234 runs. Glamorgan 172 and 183-9 declared (S.James 82 not out, M.Maynard 61; M.Robinson 4-42), Sussex 54 and 67 (S.Thomas 5-24). Glamorgan 20 points, Sussex 4.
At Southend: Essex beat Derbyshire by an innings and 145 runs. Derbyshire 142 (M.Ilott 7-59) and 86 (P.Such 5-27), Essex 373-8 declared (S.Law 157, P.Prichard 106).
At Luton: Northamptonshire v Gloucestershire - no play.
At Leicester: Leicestershire v Warwickshire - no play.
At The Oval (London): Surrey v Nottinghamshire - no play.
At Headingley (Leeds): No play today. Middlesex 150-3 (M.Ramprakash 76 not out) v Yorkshire.
